mapper.select: select a.id,a.name,a.id as org_id,'' as remark,a.orgtype as type,b.parent_id from t_org a,t_org_org b where a.id=b.child_id and b.parent_id=#{parent_id} and b.dim=#{dim} and a.state='valid' union select id,name,org_id,remark,'position' as type,org_id as parent_id from t_position where org_id=#{parent_id}
mapper.insert: delete t_position_org_access where position_id=#{position_id} and orgno=#{orgno}
mapper.select:
select a.* from t_org a,t_position_org_access b,t_position_org_user c where a.id=b.org_id and b.position_id=c.position_id and c.user_id=#{user_id} and a.orgtype ='workunit'
and b.look=1
and b.edit=1
and 1!=1
